DocAttribute.Name: Directrix
DocAttribute.Documentation: The curve used to define the sweeping operation. The solid is generated by sweeping the SELF\IfcSweptAreaSolid.SweptArea along the Directrix.

DocAttribute.Name: StartParam
DocAttribute.Documentation: The parameter value on the Directrix at which the sweeping operation commences. If no value is provided the start of the sweeping operation is at the start of the Directrix.

DocAttribute.Name: EndParam
DocAttribute.Documentation: The parameter value on the Directrix at which the sweeping operation ends. If no value is provided the end of the sweeping operation is at the end of the Directrix.

DocWhereRule.Name: DirectrixBounded
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If the values for _StartParam_ or _EndParam_ are omited, then the _Directrix_ has to be a bounded or closed curve.
